ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
1 cup cubed processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)
½ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend

cookingTips: Drain canned chicken thoroughly and flake it with a fork to remove any large chunks
Cube cream cheese and processed cheese into small pieces so they melt evenly and smoothly
Mix all ingredients in a slow cooker on low for 1-2 hours, stirring occasionally, for optimal flavor melding
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on properly draining and preparing canned chicken, and teach them how layering different cheese types creates complex flavor in the dip.
